1582880.name: Diodius ~PREMONITION~: Horizon Sacrifice
1582880.description:
The true Ironmode of Diodius ~PREMONITION~!


After several battles in Dragon's Brick, Rindo stumbles upon a gate. After it's entered, he finds himself in a creepy pararell world, where history and distortion unite. Escape this world, proving its mysterious creator is a liar!

This new, challenging DLC comes with 12 new levels, featuring 5 new quests and 4 new bosses, as well as some more achievements to unlock!
1582880.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 波兰语
